[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Reentrancy] Can vault.finish_update_asset_value enable reentrancy that allows multiple concurrent value updates for the same position? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [State Race] Can pool state change between get_position_value() call and finish_update_asset_value(), causing stale value to be committed? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Cross-Function Race] Can an attacker call update_momentum_position_value multiple times in the same transaction with different pool states to game valuation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Atomic Safety] Is the entire function atomic, or can partial failures leave vault in inconsistent state with updated timestamps but old values? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Timestamp Manipulation] Can clock.timestamp_ms() be manipulated by validators to enable time-based attacks on position valuation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Timestamp Ordering] Can multiple calls with out-of-order timestamps bypass vault's staleness checks or asset_value_updated tracking? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Oracle Timing] Can the clock parameter be from a different time than when pool state was read, causing temporal inconsistency in pricing? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Pool Reference] Can an attacker pass a malicious pool implementation that returns manipulated sqrt_price to bypass slippage checks? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Pool Mutation] Does taking &mut MomentumPool allow the function to mutate pool state, and can this be exploited to manipulate pricing? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Pool Mismatch] Can the pool parameter be a different pool than where the position exists, causing incorrect amount/price calculations? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Pool Fees] Does the function account for accumulated fees in the position, or can unclaimed fees be excluded from valuation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Pool Liquidity] Can low pool liquidity cause extreme price impact that isn't reflected in position valuation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Position Retrieval] Can vault.get_defi_asset fail silently or return a wrong position type, causing incorrect valuation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Position Reference] Can passing &MomentumPosition by reference allow external mutation during value calculation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Position Ownership] Is there validation that the position belongs to the vault, or can external positions be valued? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Position Closed] Can a closed/burned position still be retrieved and valued, causing ghost asset accounting? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Config Reference] Can a malicious OracleConfig be passed to bypass all price validation checks? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Config Consistency] Can config parameters (decimals, dex_slippage) change between slippage check and final valuation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Decimals Mismatch] Can config.coin_decimals return incorrect values for non-standard coins, breaking decimal adjustment? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Config Attack] Can an attacker manipulate dex_slippage to 10000 (100%) to effectively disable pool price validation? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Error Code] Is ERR_INVALID_POOL_PRICE = 7_001 unique across the codebase, or can error collisions cause incorrect error attribution? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Assertion Failure] Can the assert! on line 55-58 revert legitimate value updates due to temporary pool price deviation during high volatility? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Error Propagation] If get_position_value panics, does it leave vault in partially updated state? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Missing Error Check] Can get_amounts_for_liquidity fail without proper error handling, causing silent failures? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Precision Loss] Can price_a * DECIMAL lose precision for very small price_a values before division by price_b? (Medium)
